alert.note: Alert for Marion; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion and northeastern Taylor Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbellsville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Marion and northeastern Taylor Counties, including the following locations... Phillipsburg, Arista, Spurlington, Bradfordsville, Salleetown and Greenbriar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
